name: x
desc: Column to be plotted on the x axis

name: y
desc: Column to be plotted on the y axis

name: hue
desc: Column to use in grouping variable that will produce points with different colors

name: size
desc: Columns for grouping variable that will produce points with different sizes

name: sizes
desc: Minimum and Maximum numbers for selecting sizes when size variable is used

name: style
desc: Column to group variable that will produce points with different markers

name: palete
desc: Choosing the colors to use when mapping the hue semantic.

name: legend
desc: Method for choosing the colors to use when mapping the hue semantic.
